short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with any webpage using AI. Ask questions about the content and get answers by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Talk2Page Chrome extension offers an innovative solution for web browsing by transforming any webpage into an AI-powered knowledge base. With just a click, users can instantly analyze web content, extracting meaningful information while eliminating unnecessary clutter. The extension features a user-friendly interface that facilitates natural conversations, allowing users to ask questions about the content and receive contextual responses. By integrating powerful AI models, Talk2Page can provide intelligent insights and enhance the understanding of web content, making it a valuable tool for anyone seeking to improve their browsing experience.

Extension requires OpenAI api key to work.
